name: PolterPig
description:
Made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.02!

Navigate your piggie to the mushrooms while avoiding ghosts of your past self! Keep an eye on the timer because that is your lifetime. See if you can get to the mushrooms 17 times!

Enjoy!

3 Difficulties

Controls:

AWSD - move

Esc - Pause/Menu

Music:

Rolemusic - Death on the battlefield AND Shinamon No Neko

Art - me using Asperite

SFX - my mouth and https://sfbgames.com/chiptone/
